success: true
testresults:
- test:
    name: Single line
    setup: |
      cat <<SETUP > sales.csv
      Item,Quantity,Price
      1,Book,12.99
      SETUP
    expected: |
      Total: 12.99
  errreason: ""
  exitcode: 0
  stdout: |
    Total: 12.99
  stderr: ""
- test:
    name: Multi line
    setup: |
      cat <<SETUP > sales.csv
      Item,Quantity,Price
      1,Book,12.99
      2,Pen,1.50
      3,Notebook,5.75
      4,Book,12.99
      SETUP
    expected: |
      Total: 33.23
  errreason: ""
  exitcode: 0
  stdout: |
    Total: 33.23
  stderr: ""
